  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 23

Words 2201-2300

  1. requirement
    Meeting the requirement for the job was not easy.

  2. rescue
    The firefighters worked hard to rescue the cat from the tree.

  3. research
    She spent hours doing research for her school project.

  4. researcher
    The researcher discovered a new way to solve the problem.

  5. reservation
    We made a reservation at the restaurant for dinner.

  6. reserve
    He decided to reserve a seat for the concert.

  7. resident
    The residents of the small town were very friendly.

  8. resist
    It was hard to resist the smell of fresh bread.

  9. resolve
    They tried to resolve the issue before the meeting.

  10. resort
    The family stayed at a beautiful resort by the beach.

  11. resource
    Water is an important natural resource for life.

  12. respect
    It is important to show respect to your teachers.

  13. respond
    She did not know how to respond to his question.

  14. response
    His response to the invitation was quick and polite.

  15. responsibility
    Taking care of a pet is a big responsibility.

  16. responsible
    He is responsible for cleaning the kitchen after dinner.

  17. rest
    After a long day, she needed some rest.

  18. restaurant
    They went to a new restaurant to try the food.

  19. result
    The result of the test was better than expected.

  20. retain
    It is hard to retain all the information from the lecture.

  21. retire
    He plans to retire from his job next year.

  22. retired
    My grandfather is a retired teacher.

  23. return
    She will return the book to the library tomorrow.

  24. reveal
    The magician did not reveal the secret of his trick.

  25. review
    The teacher asked the students to review their notes.

  26. revise
    He decided to revise his essay before submitting it.

  27. revolution
    The invention of the internet started a revolution in communication.

  28. reward
    She received a reward for her hard work.

  29. rhythm
    The song has a nice rhythm that makes you want to dance.

  30. rice
    They had rice and vegetables for dinner.

  31. rich
    The cake was very rich and full of flavor.

  32. rid
    She wanted to get rid of the old clothes in her closet.

  33. ride
    They went for a ride on their bicycles in the park.

  34. right
    You need to turn right at the next corner.

  35. ring1
    She wore a beautiful ring on her finger.

  36. ring2
    The phone began to ring in the middle of the meeting.

  37. rise
    The sun will rise early in the morning.

  38. risk
    He took a big risk by starting his own business.

  39. river
    They went fishing by the river last weekend.

  40. road
    The road to the village was long and narrow.

  41. robot
    The robot helped clean the house quickly.

  42. rock
    He threw a rock into the lake and watched it sink.

  43. role
    She played an important role in the success of the project.

  44. roll
    The children watched the ball roll down the hill.

  45. romantic
    They had a romantic dinner by candlelight.

  46. roof
    The roof of the house was damaged in the storm.

  47. room
    The room was clean and ready for the guests.

  48. root
    The tree’s root grew deep into the ground.

  49. rope
    He used a rope to tie the boxes together.

  50. rough
    The surface of the table was rough and uneven.

  51. round
    The ball is perfectly round and easy to throw.

  52. route
    They planned the best route to avoid traffic.

  53. routine
    Her morning routine includes exercise and breakfast.

  54. row1
    They sat in the front row to watch the show.

  55. royal
    The royal family attended the ceremony.

  56. rub
    He began to rub his hands together to keep warm.

  57. rubber
    The tires are made of strong rubber.

  58. rubbish
    Please put the rubbish in the bin.

  59. rude
    It is rude to interrupt someone while they are speaking.

  60. rugby
    He enjoys playing rugby with his friends on weekends.

  61. rule
    It is important to follow the rules in the classroom.

  62. run
    She likes to run in the park every morning.

  63. runner
    The runner crossed the finish line first.

  64. running
    Running is a great way to stay healthy.

  65. rural
    They live in a rural area far from the city.

  66. rush
    There is no need to rush; we have plenty of time.

  67. sad
    She felt sad when her friend moved away.

  68. sadly
    Sadly, they could not attend the party.

  69. safe
    It is safe to cross the road when the light is green.

  70. safety
    Safety is the most important thing when driving.

  71. sail
    They decided to sail across the lake in a small boat.

  72. sailing
    Sailing is a fun activity on a sunny day.

  73. sailor
    The sailor spent months at sea before returning home.

  74. salad
    She made a fresh salad with lettuce and tomatoes.

  75. salary
    He was happy with the salary offered by the company.

  76. sale
    The store is having a big sale this weekend.

  77. salt
    She added a pinch of salt to the soup.

  78. same
    They wore the same color shirts to the event.

  79. sample
    The scientist took a sample of the water for testing.

  80. sand
    The children played in the sand at the beach.

  81. sandwich
    He made a sandwich with cheese and ham.

  82. satellite
    The satellite orbits the Earth to collect data.

  83. satisfied
    She was satisfied with the results of her hard work.

  84. satisfy
    The meal was enough to satisfy their hunger.

  85. Saturday
    They plan to go hiking on Saturday.

  86. sauce
    The pasta tasted better with the tomato sauce.

  87. save
    He worked hard to save money for a new car.

  88. saving
    Saving energy is good for the environment.

  89. say
    What did she say about the meeting?

  90. scale
    The scale showed that the package was very light.

  91. scan
    He used a scanner to scan the document.

  92. scared
    She was scared of the dark when she was a child.

  93. scary
    The movie was too scary for the little kids.

  94. scene
    The final scene of the play was very emotional.

  95. schedule
    The meeting is on the schedule for next Monday.

  96. scheme
    They came up with a scheme to solve the problem.

  97. school
    The children walked to school together every morning.

  98. science
    Science helps us understand the world around us.

  99. scientific
    The scientific study provided new insights into the disease.

  100. scientist
    The scientist worked in the lab to develop a new medicine.
